value:
$WmMPID_サイリ,ch04_41_Sairi_F_Normal,Face|It appears that Askr finds itself in a
precarious position indeed. Let us
hasten to lend our aid at once.$k$p$WmMPID_エメリナ,ch04_40_Emerina_F_Normal,Face|I agree. I may be only one woman,
but I cannot stand idly by while
people around me suffer.$k$p$WmMPID_覚醒アンナ,ch04_39_Anna_F_Normal,Face|If it's for a good cause, I guess we'll
get right down to business. We can
discuss compensation later.$k$pCount me in. How about it, Mustafa?
A war hero like you would make a
massive difference, I bet.$k$p$WmMPID_ムスタファー,ch04_43_Mustafa_M_Normal,Face|Your praise is misplaced.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What do you mean by that, General?$k$p$WmMPID_ムスタファー,ch04_43_Mustafa_M_Normal,Face|Anna's words characterize me in a far
kinder way than I deserve.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|What makes you say so?$k$p$WmMPID_ムスタファー,ch04_43_Mustafa_M_Normal,Face|As a general of Plegia, I served under
King Gangrel, whose penchant for
bloodshed is well known.$k$pMany soldiers under my command,
and even Exalt Emmeryn, perished in
a conflict that I failed to prevent.$k$p$WmMPID_エメリナ,ch04_40_Emerina_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ムスタファー,ch04_43_Mustafa_M_Normal,Face|A true son of Plegia would have
stood up to that warmonger rather
than allow his country to burn.$k$pInstead, I followed orders until the
end. I cannot claim ignorance.
Those atrocities are mine to bear.$k$pForgive me, Prince Alfonse. I cannot,
in good conscience, call myself a
Hero...nor an equal to anyone here.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|General! Wait!$k$p$WmMPID_サイリ,ch04_41_Sairi_F_Normal,Face|Such a hasty departure... This man
carries a heavy burden of guilt
upon his shoulders.$k$p$WmMPID_エメリナ,ch04_40_Emerina_F_Normal,Face|Indeed he does.$k$p
